title: Log into old account that I dont remember the password and dont have the phone for 2 factor authentication
content:
I have had a Yahoo Account since early 2000's until my home network was compromised and they locked me out of all my accounts back in 2021. I waited until the end of 2022 or begining 2023 and contacted firefox support via 3rd party who was able to unlock my account once i signed up for a subscription. well that phone was lost and along with access to [" IMINU2NOW@YAHOO.COM & ph# (541)870-0948 ; (541)731-1521 associated with the account "] and would like assistance getting back in.

Kind Regards

Daniel Lopez II
creator: iminu2deepnow

title: Victoria García Vallejo

title: Accessing email using Firefox
content:
Could not get email via the usual Firefox. Always have used Firefox to get it. What happened ???

Then something called Moxilla came along. What's that? Why do I have to use Moxilla? I want Firefox. How is it related to Moxilla? Why did something change without my permission?

Thanks, Deanna Rose
creator: dvonbargen

title: Extensions Not Working
content: I just downloaded firefox for the first time because Chrome disabled uBlocker. I have added uBlocker and 1Password as extensions, but neither of them are working on any webpage at all. I also can't pin extentions. I have restarted firefox and my computer several times. What do I do?
creator: dufresnesarahc

title: sometimes get white menu bar lately
content:
More recently, for the past few months maybe, I sometimes get a white menubar when Firefox is in the forefront. Clicking on it will restore the menubar.

Here's a pic

I am using the latest Mac OS, 15.4.1, and it happened with the previous version too.

Thanks for any help.
